meanings.definition: Beyond the boundaries or limits of something.
meanings.sent1: The adventurous explorer went outwith the safety of the village.
meanings.sent2: The garden extended outwith the fence into the open field.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel played outwith the designated play area.
meanings.sent4: Her dreams soared outwith the confines of reality.
meanings.sent5: The kite flew outwith the reach of the trees, dancing in the sky.

meanings.definition: Not within a specified place or area.
meanings.sent1: The missing keys were outwith the usual spot on the table.
meanings.sent2: The treasure chest was discovered outwith the marked boundaries of the map.
meanings.sent3: The curious cat wandered outwith the backyard into the neighbor's yard.
meanings.sent4: His thoughts often strayed outwith the confines of the classroom.
meanings.sent5: The secret passage led outwith the castle walls, hidden from view.
